home.description: I develop modern and attractive web interfaces.

home.scalable_architecture_description: Designing systems that grow effortlessly—whether it's handling 10 or 10 million requests.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Showcase of My Frontend, Backend, and DevOps Projects

skills_tools.title: Skills and Tools
skills_tools.description: Overview of all programming languages, libraries, and tools I've worked with.
skills_tools.started_career: I started my career as a web developer about
skills_tools.scope_interest: Even though the scope of web development is broad, I was very interested and focused on Front-End Development, Back-End Development and DevOps Engineering.
skills_tools.front_end_love: I love creating something that is clean and minimalistic, attractive and has value, and of course, easy to use.
skills_tools.front_end_enjoy: I really enjoy creating websites and mobile applications with rich UI components, including:
skills_tools.simple_websites: But I still like to make simple website pages like landing pages. Here are the tools I'm comfortable with for development:
skills_tools.typescript_paragraph: First of all, the programming language. I'm very comfortable using TypeScript for both web and mobile development. It adds type safety to my projects and helps prevent many common errors.
skills_tools.reactjs_paragraph: React is my main frontend library. I use it for building dynamic, interactive user interfaces with a component-based architecture that keeps my code organized and maintainable.
skills_tools.nextjs_paragraph: Next.js is my preferred React framework. I love its file-based routing, server-side rendering capabilities, and how it simplifies building fast, SEO-friendly applications.
skills_tools.expo_paragraph: For mobile app development, I use Expo with React Native. It allows me to build cross-platform mobile applications using the same React paradigms I use for web development.
skills_tools.tailwind_paragraph: For styling, I prefer Tailwind CSS. Its utility-first approach allows me to build custom designs quickly without leaving my HTML or JSX. It's perfect for maintaining consistency across projects.
skills_tools.framer_motion_paragraph: When it comes to animations, Framer Motion is my go-to library. It makes creating smooth, complex animations straightforward with an intuitive API that integrates perfectly with React.
skills_tools.back_end_love: I love building systems that are robust, scalable, secure, and efficient—always with clean architecture and developer-friendly APIs in mind.
skills_tools.third_party_integrations: Integrations with third-party APIs and services
skills_tools.small_services: While I love working on complex backend systems, I also enjoy building small, focused services that solve a single problem really well.
skills_tools.nodejs_paragraph: Node.js is my primary runtime environment for backend development. Its event-driven, non-blocking I/O model makes it perfect for building fast and scalable network applications.
skills_tools.expressjs_paragraph: Express.js is my go-to framework for building RESTful APIs. It's minimal, flexible, and allows me to quickly set up robust backend services with clean routes and middleware.
skills_tools.nestjs_paragraph: When I need more structure for larger applications, I turn to Nest.js. It combines elements from OOP, FP, and FRP, providing an excellent architecture for enterprise-grade applications.
skills_tools.php_paragraph: I'm also proficient with PHP for server-side development. It's a versatile language that I've used to build various web applications and services.
skills_tools.symfony_paragraph: Symfony is my preferred PHP framework. I appreciate its component-based architecture, flexibility, and the powerful tools it provides for building complex web applications.
skills_tools.devops_love: I'm passionate about streamlining development workflows and ensuring smooth deployment processes.
skills_tools.devops_enjoy: I'm continuously learning and working with:
skills_tools.devops_journey: I'm still growing in this area, but I've already implemented some effective solutions in my projects:
skills_tools.docker_paragraph: I use Docker to containerize applications, ensuring consistency across different environments and simplifying the deployment process. I can set up multi-container applications with Docker Compose.
skills_tools.github_actions_paragraph: For CI/CD, I've implemented GitHub Actions workflows to automate testing, building, and deployment processes, ensuring code quality and streamlining releases.
skills_tools.nginx_paragraph: I've configured Nginx as a web server and reverse proxy for my applications, optimizing performance and handling SSL/TLS termination for secure connections.
skills_tools.linux_paragraph: I maintain a home server running Debian, which I've configured for hosting various services including this portfolio. This hands-on experience has given me practical knowledge of Linux server administration.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: My educational and professional journey in development.
experience.intro: I started my IT journey in Morocco and continued my training in France. Although I don't have professional company experience yet, I've worked on concrete projects to develop my skills.
experience.education_description: My educational path has allowed me to acquire solid technical foundations and a thorough understanding of software development.
experience.projects_description: My personal and freelance projects have allowed me to apply my knowledge and explore different web and mobile technologies.

education.title: Computer Engineering School (Morocco)
education.description:
Studies up to 2nd year. Learning the fundamentals of programming with the C language, including advanced data structures such as trees, pointers, graphs, etc.

Comprehensive training also including: operating systems (Linux/Windows), computer networks (switch configuration, router, etc.), databases and SQL language, object-oriented programming with Java, web development (HTML, CSS, JS, PHP), tools like Matlab, UML modeling, and concepts of network and systems administration.

education.title: Professional Web Developer Certification
education.description: Complete web development training obtained a year ago, covering front-end and back-end. Deepening knowledge in SQL and object-oriented programming.

projects.title: Website for an Artist
projects.description: Development of a website for a fine arts artist using WordPress (at the client's request). The site allows the presentation of their works and includes a way to contact them.

projects.title: Trading Mobile App (Demo)
projects.description: Ongoing development of a demo mobile application for buying and selling African stocks and indices (JSE, EGX, BVC, NGX, NSE) using Expo and React Native.
